tweet:
Today, I joined @CASenatorJim, @J_GallagherAD3, & @CountyofButte Supervisor Steve Lambert in urging #CampFire survivors to update their housing status with @fema to ensure there is an accurate count on temporary housing needs.

Read or joint statement:  https://bit.ly/2IeCRGj  pic.twitter.com/PZ8noZRE0F

(3/3) Thank you to former CA State Senator Maurice Johannessen, who helped secure this building site, Les Melburg, the architect of the project, and to all who were involved in making this project a reality. pic.twitter.com/GyryX9S0BA

(2/3) This facility should be ready to open in 2 years and expand on many services offered to our veterans, including radiology, 2 gastrointestinal suites, speech pathology, and more. pic.twitter.com/4HO8xEaiNh
(1/3) The groundbreaking of the new VA clinic right across from the Northern California Veterans Home in Redding is great news for all Northern California veterans. pic.twitter.com/rQKH4tGY4g

Most importantly, this facility needs to be fully staffed & provide the absolute best possible care for our veterans once its doors open in 2 years. They kept their promise to protect & serve our country, so now we must keep our promise to take care of them when they return home.

It was an honor to participate in the groundbreaking for a new, 100,000 square foot, more than $50 million VA Outpatient Clinic in Redding, CA. It's an exciting day for Northern California veterans and for those who have worked hard to make this a reality. pic.twitter.com/dqY5fiIfmN

It was an honor to recognize 7 students from Northern California who received appointments to one of the five United States Service Academies. This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to earn a top-flight education while also answering the call to serve your country. pic.twitter.com/GeLb63U1K7
Helpful information to assist with preparations for the wildfire season and making your residence more fire-safe. https://twitter.com/FEMARegion9/status/1133399181563850752 …

Further proof of the crisis at our southern border that only gets worse the longer we don’t do anything to address it. CBP is overwhelmed with illegal border-crossers. When will my Dem colleagues recognize this for what it is - a national security crisis? https://www.politico.com/story/2019/05/27/trump-relocating-migrants-1344346 …
It’s no secret that a long road to recovery still lies ahead, but I’m grateful to @BlueShieldCA and PMG for their commitment to helping Butte County recover.

Paradise Medical Group’s return will reintroduce experienced doctors into their facilities in Paradise while the introduction of new technology to allow displaced residents to see a physician remotely will be a game changer.
The #CampFire has exacted a heavy toll on our community in Northern California, but with each passing day, we grow one small step closer to a sense of normalcy. pic.twitter.com/PUDg592CpL

Today, I was proud to be in attendance as Paradise Medical Group re-opens its doors in Paradise, CA and announced new virtual health services with help from @BlueShieldCA. 
 
Read my full statement---> https://bit.ly/2Kaw7fl  pic.twitter.com/Xo43QQnnK3

(4/4) Often it can seem like veterans are sent on a wild goose chase just because there isn’t a clear definition of what type documentation is required or where to get it. This bill implements uniform guidelines to simplify this process & make veterans’ lives a little bit easier.
(3/4) Currently, veterans may go years without treatment and rack up expensive medical bills all because the process to determine eligibility for benefits is so convoluted.

(2/4) After 40 years of uncertainty for veterans from WWII, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War, it’s time for the Department of Defense to establish a system to easily determine eligibility for benefits – a simple process that defines what’s acceptable and what’s not.

(1/4) This week, @RepCarbajal and I reintroduced the Veterans' Record Reconstruction Act, which will ease the process for #veterans to prove their eligibility for certain benefits or decorations. https://lamalfa.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/lamalfa-and-carbajal-reintroduce-legislation-to-help-veterans-receive …

This week, I spoke on the House floor to honor the life of one of Northern California's great constituents - Lee Jernigan from Oroville, CA. He was a veteran of WWII and a beloved educator in our community. God Bless Lee and his family, he will be missed. pic.twitter.com/qTjLPp4DEi

Today, the Senate released the text of a disaster aid package which would provide $19.1 billion for states affected by disasters in 2018. This includes areas impacted by the #CarrFire and #CampFire in Northern California. 

Read my full statement---> https://bit.ly/2EuhGyM  pic.twitter.com/l2CDZ22WOb

Congratulations to Dr. Debbie Lupeika from Redding, CA for being named as the 2019 National Clinician of the Year by the Association of Clinicians for the Underserved! I spoke on the House floor this week to recognize her for receiving this prestigious award. pic.twitter.com/LMdQAzEmXQ

Today, my colleague @RepMikeJohnson introduced a response resolution to highlight the outrageous costs of the #GreenNewDeal and the enormous harm it would bring to our country. I am fully supportive of this resolution.

Read my full statement---> https://bit.ly/2EpxX8a  pic.twitter.com/LR19iyeXVR

#ICYMI: Last night, my bill w/@RepJimmyPanetta, the Honoring Veterans' Families Act, passed the House. Veterans & their families sacrifice a great deal for our country, & our legislation will allow the spouse of a veteran to be included on a vet's grave marker if they so choose. pic.twitter.com/WakqjoZUDX

Today is the centennial of the passage of the #19thAmendment in the House of Representatives, which gave women the right to vote in all 50 states. I spoke on the House floor this morning to celebrate the 100th anniversary of this this historic milestone & great victory for women. pic.twitter.com/63X3yjXIJ9

Watch my questioning at today's Transportation and Infrastructure Committee (@TransportGOP) hearing on the impact of state-owned enterprises on American cybersecurity and jobs. https://youtu.be/6g1DCSUtpFg
This is great information regarding how @CA_DWR is managing Lake Oroville in an above-average water year. https://twitter.com/CA_DWR/status/1129104349441986562 …
Fact check on what's going on at Lake Oroville and the newly reconstructed spillway. https://twitter.com/CA_DWR/status/1129072495095570432 …

I thank @SecretaryCarson and the Administration for their efforts to help our communities recover. I will work with the state to ensure these funds are properly allocated to people in my district who desperately need it.

The U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (@HUDgov) has awarded $491,816,000 to California for wildfire recovery, including areas impacted by the #CarrFire & #CampFire. 

Read my full statement here---> https://bit.ly/2LJQAtJ  pic.twitter.com/J9cPPKHSWi
#ICYMI: Since today is Peace Officers Memorial Day, watch my speech on the House floor earlier this week recognizing #PoliceWeek https://twitter.com/RepLaMalfa/status/1128410251676540928 …

#ICYMI, today was my first hearing as Ranking Member on the @HouseAgGOP Subcommittee on Conservation & Forestry. I look forward to working with @RepSpanberger this Congress to review implementation of the conservation and forestry authorities. https://republicans-agriculture.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=6548 …

Additionally, the Oroville Dam Crest Road will be re-opening soon for pedestrian traffic and the Spillway boat launch facility is planned to be re-opened for recreation this summer. pic.twitter.com/97migD5Lrl

On Monday, Oroville Mayor Chuck Reynolds and I visited the Oroville Dam spillway with staff from @CA_DWR to receive an update following its first use in April. The newly reconstructed spillway is performing safely & in accordance with its design. pic.twitter.com/6ASoPndwSt

It's National #PoliceWeek, so I spoke on the House floor to show our law enforcement officers the recognition and appreciation that they deserve. Thank you to those who work around the clock to keep our communities safe! pic.twitter.com/X3RV1bFnih

This week is National #PoliceWeek, so join me in taking a moment to thank the officers that dedicate themselves to keeping us safe each day. Thank you for all that you do to serve our communities in Northern California! pic.twitter.com/VoMBhkFgHr

Marine Staff Sgt. Joshua Braica, from Auburn, CA, tragically passed away on Sunday, April 14th when his vehicle rolled over during a training accident at Camp Pendleton in CA. I spoke on the House floor recently to honor Joshua. God bless his family during this difficult time. pic.twitter.com/Qq4ubm1r2z

In light of the unprovoked attack by Hamas terrorists on our allies in Israel last weekend, I spoke on the House floor to defend Israel's right to defend their own citizens and respond accordingly when attacked by terrorists. pic.twitter.com/mjpgLgfpeB

(4/4) I disagree with many unnecessary provisions in this bill, but it’s an important vote to provide critical disaster assistance for the people in my district as well as other hard-hit areas that desperately need it.

(3/4) I’m working with Governor Newsom, Senator Feinstein, & both Democrats & Republicans in the Senate to craft a bipartisan disaster aid bill that can pass both chambers, become law, and actually help people.

(2/4) While I don’t believe this bill, as is, will ultimately pass the Senate or be signed by the President due to an injection of partisan priorities, it’s important to all those affected by recent disasters to keep it moving.

( 1/4) While I have many reservations about the disaster bill passed by the House today, disaster assistance for #CarrFire & #CampFire survivors is of the utmost importance, and for that reason, I voted to for it.

My full statement---> https://bit.ly/2VtkXsV  pic.twitter.com/tcUlp45O9o

This week is National Tourism & Travel Week. The industry generates billions of dollars & creates thousands of jobs in Northern California. That's why #TravelMatters for our district & our state. pic.twitter.com/UrupITE7Zv

I thank @DrPhilRoe & @HouseVetAffairs for passing my bill today as part of H.R. 1947. Veterans sacrifice a lot for our country and they should have the option of including the name of their spouse on their own tombstone if they want to. https://twitter.com/HouseVetAffairs/status/1126225916278050817 …

The #CampFire was the costliest natural disaster in the world last year & one of the worst wildfires CA has ever seen. The Resilient Federal Forests Act can help save lives & billions of dollars by giving firefighters tools they need to contain a fire before it gets out of hand. https://twitter.com/westerncaucus/status/1126224256591978496 …

Congratulations to Forest Wong, whose self-portrait "May the Forest be With You" is the winner of our 2019 Congressional Art Competition! We look forward to having your artwork represent California’s 1st District in the U.S. Capitol.

Press Release---> https://bit.ly/2PVEuff  pic.twitter.com/g9gKKeOpCY

America’s current reliance on critical minerals from countries like China & Russia is a major concern for our national security & energy independence. These are vital materials that our military & our economy both rely on, & we must have the ability to produce them here at home. https://twitter.com/westerncaucus/status/1125895647037620224 …

To dispel many of the rumors that may be circulating involving the #CampFire debris removal process, temporary housing, and more, take a look at this fact vs. myth sheet from @Cal_OES and @fema. pic.twitter.com/x3bnT9mYI3

Happy National #TeacherAppreciationDay! Thank you to all the teachers in NorCal & across the country who work tirelessly to educate America's young people. Every child deserves the opportunity to receive a quality education, & we appreciate all that you do to make that possible! pic.twitter.com/1uEJp6s1Yj

Mike Greer, of Paradise Unified School District, stopped by my office to talk about ongoing water & sewer issues. We’re working w/appropriate federal entities to ensure they receive funding needed to get the school system back to normal in a timely & efficient manner. #CampFire pic.twitter.com/4gNeHM3VwA
There is no bigger job-creator than small businesses - they're the backbone of our booming economy. #SmallBusinessWeek https://www.sba.gov/national-small-business-week/ …

Happy #SmallBusinessWeek! Over half the American workforce is employed by or operates one of 30 million small businesses nationwide. With April's strong jobs report & the unemployment rate reaching the lowest in 50 years, it's clear American small businesses are thriving. pic.twitter.com/4mZeGsqdkO

I joined over 500 people at #ComcastCaresDay to help clean-up the grounds at Paradise High School ahead of graduation ceremonies next month. They also gave each Paradise High Senior a laptop for college. Thank you @comcast for hosting this great event & to all who came out! pic.twitter.com/LnIGXA66TK

We went over their priorities in a federal infrastructure package, including the Placer Parkway Project and widening of Highway 65, forest management priorities, and funding for economic development infrastructure.

Placer County Supervisors Bonnie Gore, Robert Weygandt, Kirk Uhler, Placer County CEO Todd Leopold, & other county staff stopped by my office this week to discuss many current issues affecting Placer County. pic.twitter.com/z9SfDb9dQL

Breaking: The unemployment rate in April dropped to 3.6% - the lowest in 50 years! There are now far more job openings than there are unemployed Americans. More great news for the American economy that has thrived under pro-growth policies. #GOPTaxCuts https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/1124292420806557697 …

The Paris Climate Agreement was poorly negotiated, had major negative impacts on American energy independence, and increases consumer costs for energy use. Yet H.R. 9 would force the U.S. to stay in this bad agreement. 

Read my full statement here---> https://bit.ly/2ZRfAlS  pic.twitter.com/PRcVD1SXBN
WATCH: I took to the House floor to join our friends in Israel and in Jewish communities around the world in recognizing #HolocaustRemembranceDay. pic.twitter.com/O6qo1gXAfA

Good news - @fema has awarded $1,008,694 in grant funding to repair access roads near #OrovilleDam, which have been damaged by the transport of heavy machinery & materials during the reconstruction process. https://lamalfa.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/lamalfa-announces-additional-grant-funding-to-repair-roads-damaged-by …

H.R.9 would seek to prevent the President from withdrawing from the misguided Paris Climate Agreement. This is a bad idea. Watch my speech on the House floor urging my colleagues to vote against this partisan attack on American energy production. https://twitter.com/westerncaucus/status/1123645473682751490 …
Great news for our economy! https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/1123561911948316672 …
